title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API and model library.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, generate, pull, push, list, delete models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM, chat and embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, embeddings, list/pull/generate APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, list, delete models with configurable timeouts.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client for Ollama written in Rust; chat, model ops, keyboard driven.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement via VS Code extension.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda Community extension to call Ollama models from BPMN service tasks.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running ollama server containerized.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in Docker.

title: ollama-chat-nextjs
summary: Next.js starter template with Ollama-js for streaming chat and model selector.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify now supports Ollama as a local model provider for prompt orchestration & RAG.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat, generate code, or refactor using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node to integrate Ollama generate/chat into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async wrappers for Ollama REST API; generate, chat, embeddings.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and streaming support via HttpClient.
